solution_line_template: If Julie donated ${julie_donation} to Jayden's campaign, and Margo donated ${margo_donation}, the difference in their contribution is ${julie_donation}-${margo_donation}=$<<{julie_donation}-{margo_donation}={difference_in_contribution}>>{difference_in_contribution}
Half the difference in the amount they contributed is {half_fraction}*${difference_in_contribution}=$<<{half_fraction}*{difference_in_contribution}={half_difference}>>{half_difference}
